patha pothata harennata wenath kisiwakata wishesha aadarayak nodakwana bawak penwana hichchi ayiyata apa siyallangema hith hodin kiyawimata thibu hakiyawath, ohu anek ayage sithum pathum walata dakwu sanwedithawath ma hodin therum gaththe ohuda apen boho aathakata giya pasuya.

athyawashya aushadha warga wala mila adu kirima agaya kala yuthu karunak wuwath, emagin saukhya amathyawarayata erehiwa sama thanakama sathuran athiwima walakwiya nohaki bawa loka saukhya sanwidhanaye dakunu saha nagenahira aasiyanu ratawala adhyakshika waidya punam chettrapal sin mahathmiya pawasayi.

mata athi gataluwanam, thani pudgalayeku ho kihipa denekuge nayakathwayen ewan sigra diyunuwak athkaragannenam aanduwaka meheya wimen, rajayaka meheyawimen, rataka meheyawimen pawathwagena yanu labana rajya aayathana dinen dina pirihenne ayida kiyana karanayayi.

palath palana mathiwaranayen pasuwa me wasarema palath sabha mathiwaranaya da pawathwannata niyamithawa athi bawin, wyawastha sanshodhana yojana parlimenthuwata gena eema thawaduratath kal yanu athi bawada ema aaranchi marga sandahan karayi.

sanniwedanaya ha madhya adhyayanaya wishaya nirdeshaye ‘madhya nirmana wicharaya’ themawata adalawa, kolambaa wishakha widyalayiya madhya sansadaya wisin ‘rathriya’ namin gi nirmana agayime prasangayak warsha 2014 marthu masa 24 wani dina sawasa 6.00 sita kolambaa bandaranayaka sammanthrana shalawe ‘kamatha’ elimahan parishraye di pawathwe.deshaye tharuna parapura thula wicharashili nirmanathmaka chinthanayak godanangime udarathara aramunin sidukarana me prasangaye di ‘rathriya’ prasthutha karaganimin wiwidha themawan osse diwena harawath githa nirmana idiripath kerena athara ee sandaha prasiddha gayaka gayikawan kihipadenaku da sahabhagiwimata niyamithaya.

“korona wairasa prashnayata athi sudanama ha eyata dakwiya yuthu prathicharaya wimarshanaya kirima” sandaha pawathi anthar-amathyansha raswimakin anathuru wa agramathya karyalaya wisin nikuth kala prakashayak thula, mewa “apage sudaname mattama wadi diyunu kirima pinisa wana wadagath wenaskam” yayi marthu 4da modi aanduwa kayiwaru gasuwe ya.
